overview: When Dia marries widower Jack, she seems more interested in his young daughter Ashlyn than him. Dia uses her maladjusted, lithium fed daughter (Aiden Star) and demented lesbian foster-child (Dana DeArmond) to coerce her beautiful new step-daughter into her bed and have her utter those beautiful words, "I love you Mommy."
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas
